rsbNotes.title: Pr 30:15–31
rsbNotes.text: 30:15–31 On the form of these numerical sayings, see notes 6:16–19.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 30:21
rsbNotes.text: 30:21 the earth trembles. The four items in vv. 22, 23 hardly seem able to produce such dire consequences in the natural order. This is likely a figure of speech for an intolerable state of affairs.
